subject: Diffuser Attachment Damage - BLD-Curl Master
body:
Hello,

I bought my BreezeLite BLD-Curl Master dryer on April 5, 2026, and I love the results it gives for my curly hair.

Unfortunately, one of the mounting ring prongs on the diffuser attachment broke off while I was attaching it to the dryer head. The diffuser can no longer mount securely.

I was careful when attaching it, but the prongs seem quite delicate. I wondered if this could be a manufacturing defect or if it's covered under warranty for replacement.

I have the receipt and photos of the broken diffuser.

Thanks,
Lisa Brown
lisa.brown@email.com
